definition: an energetic American dance that was popular in the 1930s, probably named for the aviator Charles Lindbergh
details:
noun
- an energetic American dance that was popular in the 1930s, probably named for the aviator Charles Lindbergh
= example: an energetic American dance that was popular in the 1930s, probably named for the aviator Charles Lindbergh
= synonyms: lindy hop
